Interrogator: So in the house, what was this man addicted to?
Interrogee: He was addicted to alcohol, and he also loved Comrade Crunch and milk. Okay.

Interrogee: Yeah, he asked his wife, "Why didn't you buy alcohol last night? You know that I drink alcohol day and night."

Interrogee: Yeah, later she screamed at him that you waste all the money on alcohol, and she didn't have any money to buy anything.

Interrogee: Because she saw that the man had spent all the money on alcohol, and she didn't have any money to buy household things.

Interrogator: Where did the man go after leaving his house and what was the reason?
Interrogee: He went out to buy alcohol as there was no alcohol in the house, and he was addicted to alcohol. Okay.
